name: Limit Line - The Line of Life
name_original: Limit Line - The Line of Life
description:
Attention skydivers, race car drivers and storm chasers: THIS GAME IS FOR YOU!!! Do you have quick reactions? How long can you follow the line? Try this new fast-paced extreme arcade game!

Hold the left and right sides of the screen to guide the line and avoid obstacles.

Characteristics:

>> Free to play!

>> Endless gameplay

>> Challenging levels

>> Multiplayer game!

>> Compete with players from all over the planet!

>> Addictive and fun for all ages!

ABOUT CRAZY LABS

Crazy Labs is a casual gaming brand on behalf of whom TabTale develops and publishes fun and addictive games. Crazy Labs partners with independent development studios around the world to create engaging mobile content for audiences of all ages.

PRIVACY:

  • This app is free to play, but certain in-game items can be purchased for real money. You can restrict in-app purchases by turning them off on your device.

  • By downloading this App, you are agreeing to TabTale's Privacy Policy and Contractual Conditions available at: http://tabtale.com/privacy-policy/ and at: http://tabtale.com/terms-of- use /.

This app may include third-party services, such as ad networks and analytics services, and may contain social media links that allow users to communicate with each other. The collection and use of data is subject to TabTale's Privacy Policy.
